resources.string: Are you sure you want to remove the following items?
Access points that are currently connected has been registered in the already trusted access point.
Wireless LAN could not get the information because it is off.
Trusted access point or Bluetooth device is not registered.
Some devices do not appear for the following reason
All devices and is registered as a trusted devices that is set in the pair with Bluetooth.
Bluetooth device information can not acquired because Bluetooth adapter is turned off.
To reflect the update you need to restart the scheduler. Are you sure you want to restart the scheduler right now?
